programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Kopýtko: László má problémy s upchatým WC a u Františka zas netečie voda. Marta Sladká má dohodnuté rande s novým milencom, ale v jej byte sa nekúri, a tak potrebuje prichýliť u Lászla. Ildikó s tým však zásadne nesúhlasí. László je ochotný pomôcť, ale pod podmienkou, že bude v byte počas romantického stretnutia prítomný. Zuzana má problém, lebo jej bezšnúrová naparovacia žehlička, ktorá by mala žehliť oblečenie bezpečne aj priamo na tele, vykazuje výrobnú chybu. Ako dopadne rande Marty za prítomnosti Lászla a ako to prežije Ildikó, ak na to príde? Pozná Martin milenec aj Zuzanu? A kto si chce vlastne vyhodiť z kopýtka?

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú IV
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2015).
programme.desc: Michal si zaumieni, že dostane Sebiho spod Romanovho a Norinho vplyvu aj proti jeho vôli. Roman najme súkromného detektíva, aby zistil, kde sa ukrýva Boris. Podarí sa Igorovi a Zuzane zabrániť Katkinmu otcovi previesť Ivanka spolu s Katkou na kliniku do zahraničia?

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Reverzný proces: Vlado, Jana, Nataša a Lulo si prenajímajú väčší dom. Až na Lula si spolu celkom rozumejú a nemajú medzi sebou žiadne väčšie problémy. Naopak, Lulo vyhľadáva konflikty, v ktorých sa zvykne vyžívať. Situácia sa dokonca stane pre jedného z obyvateľov neznesiteľnou...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Dobrodruh: Rudo a Anna žijú v spoločnej domácnosti v bungalove na okraji mesta. Nie sú manželia, aj keď Rudo by sa už rád usadil a mal rodinu. Anna zatiaľ necháva vzťah plynúť, nazdáva sa, že je na svadbu ešte primladá. Dvojica sa zasnúbi, no plány o skorej svadbe nabúra príchod Rudovho mladšieho brata Milana...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú IV
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2015).
programme.desc: Igor získa potvrdenie otcovstva. Kristián sa rozhodne splniť Romanove zadanie vziať Renátu na exotickú dovolenku a umožniť mu za ten čas obrať ju o celý majetok. Nora a Boris sa budú musieť vyrovnávať s matkinou smrťou.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Vitaj doma, kičibaba: Ildikó sa vracia z pôrodnice, ale je sklamaná, Lászlo nepripravil privítacie prekvapenie. Zuzanu nový investor vyšachoval a s pomocou tichého spoločníka prevzal kontrolu nad jej biznisom. Už nebude robiť vlogy, nahradí ju mladá herečka. František má tiež depresiu, reštaurácia vykazuje len dlhy. Lászlo sa snaží nedať si pokaziť náladu rozladenou Ildikó, ani faktom, že sám presne nevie, ako sa vlastne bude celým menom volať jeho syn. Milka hľadá dobrého právnika - otec jej dieťaťa čaká v Nórsku dvojičky s eskimáčkou. Ako vyriešia František a Lászlo krachujúcu reštauráciu? Kto je tichý spoločník Zuzaninho biznisu a naozaj chce ukradnúť jej “Pre mamičky od Zuzičky”? Podarí sa Lászlovi uspokojiť popôrodný stres Ildikó?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Stará láska nehrdzavie: Zuzane sa nepáči, akú úlohu jej pridelili v teleshopingu. František má migrénu, lebo Ágoston v noci nespí a má hlas ako cirkulárka. Lászlo to tiež nezvláda a zaspáva kdekoľvek, aj uprostred vety. Milka s Evanom nemá kde bývať, Marekove “mamy” ju vyhodili z bytu. Aj Gergely sa opäť vracia domov. Lászlo s Františkom sa rozhodnú dať Milku s Gergelym dohromady. Live teleshopingové vysielanie sa vymkne spod kontroly, keď ho narušia poštár, s mamou chce počas vysielania rozprávať Milka a nakoniec aj Marta Sladká. Podarí sa napriek vymeneným darčekom dostať Milku a Gergelyho na spoločné rande? Vyrieši Lászlo spánkový deficit? Ukončí Zuzana spoluprácu s teleshopom?

programme.title: Svadba na prvý pohľad III
programme.sub-title: Jedinečná svadobná romantická šou
programme.desc: Svadobná cesta Karin a Dušana je v závere. Ich ďalšie kroky povedú do Bratislavy, kde budú zdieľať spoločnú domácnosť. Ako bude vyzerať ich dvadsaťštyrihodinové spolužitie po návrate zo Srí Lanky? Posledné horúce dni v Mexiku si naďalej užívajú Jožko a Janka. Majú za sebou prvé nezhody, ale aj dni plné zábavy. Zatiaľ čo im sa svadobná cesta pomaly, ale isto chýli ku koncu, Mirku a Mateja čakajú prvé spoločne strávené dni v krajine čarovnej histórie - Jordánsku. Budú mať úsmev na tvári rovnako, ako tomu bolo pred oltárom? Na ďalšiu zo svadieb sa presunieme do Veľkej Británie. Tam na svoj veľký deň čaká v poradí štvrtý pár - Monika a Michal. Ich svadba však prinesie množstvo napätia, zvratov a v ohrození bude aj samotný sobáš. Prekonajú prekážky, ktoré im prinesie sám život?

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Obľúbená reality šou Farma je späť! Neuveriteľná 14. séria sa opäť predstaví v originálnom novom koncepte a s množstvom zaujímavých prekvapení. Jedným z nich je aj zmena na poste moderátora - populárny herec Marek Fašiang sa stane prvým mužským moderátorom v histórii šou. Na moderovanie však nebude sám. Okrem neho a hospodára Martina Bagara bude na farmárov jedným očkom dohliadať Alica – umelá inteligencia. Najprevratnejšia novinka na Farme však nezmení tradičný koncept šou. Farmári si stále budú musieť poradiť s drsnými podmienkami na statku, s nedostatkom jedla či manuálnou prácou. Alica sa bude súťažiacim pravidelne prihovárať spoza stola pravdy vo farmárskej kuchyni. Bude s nimi voliť duelantov, odovzdávať im aj odkaz od vypadnutého súťažiaceho a neustále ich sledovať. Keď to vyhodnotí ako potrebné, tak zasiahne. Farmári si budú musieť zvyknúť na to, že Alica, ako umelá inteligencia, nemá žiadne city. Nepozná ani zľutovanie. Za príjemným ženským hlasom sa skrýva silný charakter. Alicina silná stránka sú dáta a čísla. Je výborná v analýzach, o farmároch vie takmer všetko a vždy má pravdu. Za moment dokáže rozlúsknuť konflikty. Pre farmárov bude poriadnym šokom, ktorý v boji o 75-tisíc eur určite nečakali.

programme.title: Sestričky III
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR (2020).
programme.desc: Táňa je tehotná, a keďže tak veľmi po tom túžila, začína mať prehnaný strach o svoje zdravie. Nedokáže to v sebe potlačiť, a tak prechádza na iné oddelenie, kde sa bude cítiť viac v bezpečí. Peter ju nedokáže pochopiť, zdá sa mu to prehnané. Marta si s chorým dievčatkom vytvorila blízky vzťah. Nikto nechápe, čo sa s ňou deje, ešte nikdy sa o pacienta tak intenzívne nezaujímala. Marta popiera, že by to bolo iné, než len profesionálny záujem. Helena sa sťažuje Oliverovi, že najradšej by všetkým povedala pravdu, lebo jej správanie na oddelení začína byť podozrivé. Oliver ju napomenie, že musí udržať tajomstvo. Helene sa to nepáči. Miesto, o ktoré Filip usiloval dostane nakoniec Garinová. Filip nedokáže skryť žiarlivosť, podpichuje Dana ohľadom Emy a jej nového životného štýlu, takmer sa pobijú. Helena sa pred Martou preriekne, že vie o fúzii, tá sa jej však prizná s niečím zo svojej minulosti, o čom nikto netušil.

programme.title: Aj múdry schybí
programme.sub-title: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym
programme.desc: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Reverzný proces: Vlado, Jana, Nataša a Lulo si prenajímajú väčší dom. Až na Lula si spolu celkom rozumejú a nemajú medzi sebou žiadne väčšie problémy. Naopak, Lulo vyhľadáva konflikty, v ktorých sa zvykne vyžívať. Situácia sa dokonca stane pre jedného z obyvateľov neznesiteľnou...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Depozitum: Ondrej a Peter žijú so svojimi manželkami v spoločne zdedenom dome po otcovi. Starý dom, ktorý bol ich jediným dedičstvom, nebol ideálnym miestom, navyše si vyžadoval rekonštrukciu, na ktorú nemala ani jedna rodina peniaze. Všetko sa zmenilo po tom, čo Peter našiel na povale tajomný balíček...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Bude svadba?: Nastal ten veľký deň. Tesne pred odchodom na obrad sa zistí, že miestnosť ani svadobná hostina nie je zabezpečená. Pri organizácii prišlo k nedorozumeniu. László, ktorý to mal na starosti si omylom myslel, že to vybavuje František. V panike takmer zmeškajú odchod na svadbu. Milka s Gergejom musia hodnú chvíľu trúbiť v aute pod oknami a ani tak si ich nikto nevšíma. Na úrade sa zistí, že Ildikó zabudla obrúčky pre novomanželov. Ešteže Marta prišla na motorke a tak sa László a František stihnú pre ne vrátiť. Ale vrátia sa v zdraví aj späť? Navyše mešká Františkov otec, ktorý si pomýlil adresu a nakoniec skončí vo vlaku, ktorý ho nenávratne odváža mimo mesto. Ani netuší, že mal byť aj ženíchovým svedkom. Kto sa zhostí tejto úlohy takto narýchlo? Stihne sa v časovom limite vykonať obrad, keď už trpezlivosť dochádza ja samotnému oddávajúcemu? Ako dopadne vypustenie holubice, symbolu lásky? Kde nakoniec bude svadobná hostina? Bude naozaj Peter Cmorik hrať mladomanželom? A prečo nedorazil ani objednaný koč ťahaný bielymi koňmi?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Svadobné fotografie: Ildikó sa vracia domov ráno v župane. László je zarazený a uvažuje, či má začať žiarliť. Viac ho ale prekvapia veľké svadobné fotografie Milky a Gergeja, ktoré dala Ildikó urobiť trojmo pre všetky rodiny. Jednu hneď odnesie susedom. Andrejka sa postupne so všetkými lúči, sťahuje sa do Viedne. František a László zháňajú celebritu na slávnostný výstrel v Deň Svätého Huberta - zahájenie poľovníckej sezóny. Keď Ildi nesie fotografiu Gergejovi, zastihne ho práve v objatí s Andrejkou. Ildi podozrieva Andrejku, že stále miluje Gergeja a chce ho získať späť. Jej podozrenie potvrdzuje aj to, že Andrejka vraj nechtiac zničí dve z troch svadobných fotografií... Poteší táto dekorácia všetkých tak ako chcela Ildikó? Kto je nový Andrejkin nápadník, ktorý si od nej požičiava peniaze a sľúbil jej byt vo Viedni? A kto sprostredkúva predaj jej starého bytu? Naozaj je Milkin život v ohrození, alebo je v nebezpečenstve niekto iný?

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Gizka dokáže pomôcť aj v rodine, kde na prvý pohľad nie sú vzťahové ani existenčné problémy. Ide však o život. Mama 14-ročného Sebastiána vidí v Svokre poslednú nádej. Sebastián má 143 kíl a jeho rodičia sa márne pokúšajú, aby ich syn schudol. Po príchode Gizky sa všetko mení - diéta, lekári, pravidelné cvičenie. A „Sebiho“ váha ide dole...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Dvakrát do tej istej rieky: Tridsaťosemročná Mirka žije od rozvodu s dospievajúcim synom Davidom sama. Davidov otec Roman na syna pravidelne prispieva, no nemá veľa času sa mu venovať, čo niekedy sa mu snaží vynahradiť darčekmi. Na ostatné narodeniny mu Roman kúpi niečo, čo zaskočí nielen Davida, ale i Mirku...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Spriaznená duša: František má nápad ako vyriešiť psíčkarov, ktorí neupratujú psie exkrementy a László zas potrebuje spriaznenú dušu. Marta má presne takú kamarátku, čo by sa na to hodila. Františkova dcéra Milka sa zo zahraničia, kde pracuje, ohlási na krátku návštevu doma. Zuzana sa vyhýba prebratiu doporučenej zásielky. Hrozí jej žaloba od nespokojných zákazníkov? A má to nejaký súvis s Martiným zosnulým manželom? Spoznáme Milku alebo ju pobyt v zahraničí zmenil na nepoznanie?

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú IV
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2015).
programme.desc: Nora požiada Viktora, aby jej pomohol s plánovaným Borisovým útekom. Roman pristihne Sebiho, ktorý sa práve chystal otráviť. Ján urobí na doktorku Molákovú veľký dojem a tá začne svoj vzťah k nemu prehodnocovať.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Nočný fantóm: Dôchodkyňa Pavlína žije v malej štvorbytovke. Hoci to vyzerá tak, že každý tam každého pozná, nie je to celkom tak, pretože sa v nej začnú diať čudesné veci. Pavlínina priateľka Gerda, ktorá prichádza na návštevu, sa rozhodne vypátrať, čo je za tým...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Výpomoc: Denisa je atraktívna a ambiciózna moderátorka, ktorá miluje svoju prácu. A je úspešná, vedenie televízie jej dokonca ponúkne zaujímavú pracovnú ponuku. Denisa ju s radosťou prijme, no začína mať zdravotné ťažkosti. Vyhľadá lekára, ktorý jej oznamuje, že je tehotná. Manžel Adam sa poteší, no Denisa nevie či materské povinnosti a vysnívanú prácu dokáže zvládnuť...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú IV
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2015).
programme.desc: Lekári vzdajú boj o Katkino prebratie. Roman zakáže Oľge vychádzať z domu a pohrozí jej, že ak zákaz poruší, pošle ju na kliniku. Podarí sa Nore presvedčiť Zorbu aj Romana, že nemá nič spoločné s bratovým útekom?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Ja rodím!: Ildikó je pripravená ísť do pôrodnice. Lászlo si myslí, že je to predčasné, ale musí sa podvoliť. Zuzanina mama síce chodí na raňajky k dcére, ale onedlho bude mať vo Vegas svadbu s plastickým chirurgom. Marta chystá v reštaurácii originálnu "beach párty" pred Vianocami. Fero sa bojí, že z modeliek v bikinách môže mať Lászlo problém a s Ildikó určite. Marta si je istá, že v pôrodnici sa nemajú ako dozvedieť o akcii. Zuzkina mama musí bývať u Zuzany, Majkl zrušil svadbu. Neostalo jej ani z čoho zaplatiť luxusný hotel. Ildikó sa v nemocnici cíti dobre, nič nenasvedčuje, že by mala rodiť, má však chuť na ananás. Zoženie Lászlo ananás aspoň na párty vo svojej reštaurácii? Naozaj sa o tom nedozvie Ildikó? Kde sa podarí Zuzane ubytovať svoju mamu? Stihne Lászlo pôrod svojho syna?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Si moja nádej: František pripravuje oslavu pre príchod svojho menovca a krstného syna z nemocnice. Ildikó však ešte domov nepustia, kvôli žltačke. Horšie je, že Ildi dieťa pomenovala Ágošton a chce zrušiť Františka aj ako krstného otca. Lászlo mu to však nedokáže oznámiť. František už na privítanie zložil aj pesničku “Si moja nádej”. Zuzana tiež očakáva príchod pána Františka, investora, ktorý má záujem financovať jej internetový portál. Chystá prezentáciu a chce si na to prenajať reštauráciu. Všetci sú Františkovými prípravami dojatí a len Milka si trúfa povedať mu zlú správu. Nanešťastie sa zasekne vo výťahu. Aké to na nej zanechá následky? A ako to ovplyvní výsledok prezentácie pre investora? Podarí sa nakoniec presvedčiť Ildikó dojímavou pesničkou, aby zmenila názor a premenovala svojho syna?

programme.title: Svadba na prvý pohľad III
programme.sub-title: Jedinečná svadobná romantická šou
programme.desc: Krásna Karin a sexi Dušan už majú svadbu za sebou. Zdá sa, že ich očakávania boli naplnené a iskra medzi nimi preskočila doslova na prvý pohľad. Uvidíme teda, ako sa ich láske bude dariť na romantickej svadobnej ceste na Srí Lanke. Druhý pár, ktorý sa zoznámi tiež až pred oltárom, je neistá motorkárka Jana a dobrácky poľnohospodár Jozef. Padne sympatickej Jane s jasnými predstavami o budúcom partnerovi usmievavý Jozef do oka?

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Nočný fantóm: Dôchodkyňa Pavlína žije v malej štvorbytovke. Hoci to vyzerá tak, že každý tam každého pozná, nie je to celkom tak, pretože sa v nej začnú diať čudesné veci. Pavlínina priateľka Gerda, ktorá prichádza na návštevu, sa rozhodne vypátrať, čo je za tým...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Dvakrát do tej istej rieky: Tridsaťosemročná Mirka žije od rozvodu s dospievajúcim synom Davidom sama. Davidov otec Roman na syna pravidelne prispieva, no nemá veľa času sa mu venovať, čo niekedy sa mu snaží vynahradiť darčekmi. Na ostatné narodeniny mu Roman kúpi niečo, čo zaskočí nielen Davida, ale i Mirku...

programme.title: A Park for All Seasons IV (4)
programme.desc: Liard River Hot Springs Provincial Park. A healthy bison population is threatened by where they eat.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons (4)
programme.desc: Winter. Winter is the ultimate challenge. As temperatures plunge across much of America, some animals escape to milder climes of the South, while others stay put and tough out the brutal cold and blizzards that blanket the North.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VI (9)
programme.desc: Nearest and Deerest. Hope tries fostering a fawn with an unrelated doe; two fawns are rushed to the emergency clinic.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas (3)
programme.desc: Savannah. The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether it's head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas (4)
programme.desc: India. Welcome to India - a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare; monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.sub-title: Blast Off Bugs

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean in Love. He’s got her record, the poster and the T-shirt, so when Mr. Bean’s heart-throb, Roxy, is set to sing in concert at the London Palladium, he sets his sights on the only thing that will make his life complete: her signature in his autograph book. A difficult feat but can love prevail?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Double Trouble. Mr. Bean is over the moon when he meets Mr. Pod because both men have so much in common; same shirt, jacket, trousers and underpants. And to top it all, Pod is Bean’s spitting image! Bean falls to Earth with a bump, though, when his girlfriend, Irma Gobb, finds Mr. Pod much better looking than him.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Home Movie. Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece –featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Fish Sitting. Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wicket’s pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbour’s house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: What if Tom and Jerry were born in Asia? Follow the new adventures of Tom and Jerry as they feast, play and create mayhem Asia! From food, culture, history and places of interests, get ready for double trouble!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Lame Duck. Ginger and Rick have installed a new birdbath, and Little Quacker has taken up residence in it. Ginger forbids Tom from going out in the back and has Rick move Spike's house. The dog and cat soon unite to return Little Quacker to the pond without Ginger finding out they're responsible for sending him packing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: It's All Relative. When Jerry's country cousins visit the Abbey, the cook is convinced Downton is in the midst of a vermin invasion! Cates (the butler) presses Tom into service with the threat of becoming a stable cat otherwise. Tom pursues the cunning, feisty bumpkins, and Jerry, throughout the manor, and they delight in making surprise appearances to Tom in awkward moments.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Vegged Out. Jerry discovers the mysterious phobia cats have toward cucumbers and is inspired to try it out on Tom. After freaking Tom out repeatedly, Butch steps in to counsel Tom and help him overcome his fear, only Butch is far from immune himself. The two encounter more and more trouble as they deal with their phobia.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Lost Marbles. A dim-witted cat walks into the detective agency asking for help. It seems he has lost his marbles: He's the city's champion marble player and has either misplaced his case of lucky marbles, or it's been stolen. The cat is desperate to find them before the big tournament. It's up to Tom and Jerry to retrace the cat's steps and solve this mystery.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Frown and Country. Jerry is feeling lonely and wishes he had a girlfriend. Spike explains spring fever to Tom and they leave him be. Jerry's mood improves when he gets a message from his brawny cousin Muscles, who has fixed him up with his girlfriend's friend for a double date.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Vocal Yokel. Little Quacker develops the ability to sing like Pavarotti. But when Tom plots to use this to win a prize on the "Pets With Talent" TV show, Little Quacker refuses and Jerry covers for him. As things continue to snowball, it's up to Tom to attempt saving the day.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Hamster Hoopla. After Ginger keeps an abandoned pet hamster unbeknown to Rick, Jerry takes its place after the hamster scurries off. However, Jerry soon gets displaced by baby hamsters that keep multiplying. Soon the situation is out of control.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.sub-title: New Cat in Town
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.sub-title: The Magic of Spring
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Games. The bugs talk about what games they like to play.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Taxi Bean. Mr Bean takes a taxi to his local toyshop but a dodgy cabbie thinks he can take Mr Bean for a ride. After a mix up Mr Bean finds himself driving the taxi and starts to have fun couriering people to their destinations even giving an American tourist an extensive tour of London. But will the taxi driver find out what’s been going on and how much will Bean’s final fare be?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Muscle Bean. Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: A New Friend. Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: The Lift. Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Ditzy Home. Stephan upgrades the house's security system and it looks like Mike might be able to take a break from playing guard dog. The new system immediately detects when the raccoons are trying to break in and ejects from the property. Mike didn't even have to lift a paw. Unfortunately, the system works a little too well and quickly targets Mike as an intruder too. Now Mike and Freddy are on the same team trying to break in so he can defeat the errant security system and save Mercury and Fluffy who are still trapped inside.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXVI
programme.desc: Let’s Race: The Egg Race. Thomas and Friends get to pair with the professionals in the Sodor Cup Games, where they’ll test their skills – starting with an egg race. Will everyone make it to the finish line with all their eggs?

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: A Round of Golf. Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Superhero Bean. A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wicket’s house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: What a load of Rubbish. Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: The Robot. Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Ice Cream. Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Birthday Party. Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isn’t invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party – even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: In The Garden. Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: A Magic Day Out. Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Ball Pool. Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Pizza Bean. Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: The Photograph. Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Dancing Bean. Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Shopping. Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Royal Bean. When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers there's only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majesty's corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show V

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Hopping Mad! When the frogspawn in Mr. Bean’s bath hatch out, it’s the last thing his landlady needs, especially when she’s invited the Mayor for tea. Hundreds of angry amphibians decide to invite themselves as well. Bean proves to be no expert at catching slippery green things that won’t stop hopping about all over the blinking place.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A Grand Invitation. Mr. Bean meets an aristocratic old lady when he nearly runs over her lapdog with his mini. He’s thrilled to be invited for luncheon at her grand but strangely shabby mansion. Bean is determined to rise to the occasion. He’s so busy with matters of protocol he doesn’t notice that the lady and her sinister butler aren’t quite what they seem…

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A Royal Make-over. How does one choose tasteful wallpaper these days? After watching a royal documentary on TV, Mr. Bean decides to decorate his room in the style of Buckingham Palace. If the Queen’s new wallpaper is good enough for Her Royal Highness, then it’s going to be good enough for him. Meanwhile, his landlady, Mrs. Wicket, suffers from illusions of grandeur and crowns herself Queen of the street.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: SuperMarrow. Mr. Bean finds himself in a race to grow a giant marrow with his next-door neighbour. There’s prize money at stake and a chance to get his photo in the papers. And so, as the competition gets tough, Bean’s gardening techniques become more ingenious, unconventional and desperate.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Home Away from Home. Tom falls asleep inside a rolled-up carpet left out on the curb by Rick with a "free" sign attached. When the new owners unload their pickup truck and leave the carpet in front of their home, a sleepy Tom doesn't notice at first that everything is similar to, but a little different than, his usual surroundings. Soon Tom feels that he's landed in bizarro world.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: From Riches to Rags. After a series of beatings from Tom, Jerry storms off into his mouse hole. Soon he falls asleep and dreams himself to be the Lord of Downton Abbey! Tom is now servant to Lord Jerry, and the Master wastes no time in making Tom's life miserable. Tom is caught in the act of exacting revenge, so Lord Jerry challenges Tom to a duel in the dream world.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Chew Toy. Tom is watching a hypnotist on TV, when the words "you are asleep" hit him hard. He becomes a virtual rag doll and ends up in a jumble of junk for Rick and Ginger's yard sale. A woman who thinks he's a stuffed animal buys him. Jerry feels bad and hops aboard the car to rescue Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Live and Let Diet. The Lady of the Manor's prize Pomeranian, Alfred, must get some pounds off before the big dog show. The butler suggests exercise—chasing a cat perhaps? Tom happily obliges, as Alfred's successful weight loss guarantees him a cushy spot upstairs. Meanwhile, Jerry aims to sabotage Tom's efforts.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Auntie Social. When Rick and Ginger go to a couple's retreat, they leave Tom with Rick's Auntie Louella. Hearing that she's a whiz in the kitchen, Jerry comes along. The old woman is sweet, but she has a nasty little lap dog that bedevils Tom like crazy. Louella keeps treating Tom poorly, and Tom and Jerry make their plans to escape.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: A Snootful. The Lady of the House's cousins, the Van der Snoots, visit with their prize-winning Persian cat, Prancy Van der Snoot. Tom is warned to make sure that Snooty doesn't catch sight of the pesky manor mice, lest she get upset or dirty her snowy white paws chasing the vermin. Tom is on it, but nothing goes as planned...

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Things We Love. The bugs talk about what they love.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Hotel Bean. A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Bean’s house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But it’s not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Jurassic Bean. Mr Bean is on a photography jaunt in the countryside snapping the normal everyday wildlife – a fox a bird a dinosaur! A DINOSAUR?!! Mr Bean is terrified until he realises what fame and fortune it could bring him. Does he get the photograph of a lifetime or is the situation not quite as it seems?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Caring Bean. Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Opera Bean. Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Change. The bugs talk about how they feel when things change.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Rescuing Roxanne. Playing with Louise and her doll gives Mike an idea. He decides to stage a rescue mission with the doll from the roof of the Mikkelson's house so he can be a hero and impress Iris. But as he prepares to show Iris that he's a real-life superhero, the racoons arrive and ruin his plans. Mercury falls in love with the doll the minute he lays eyes on it while Freddy sets his sights on her sparkly tiara. Now Mike has a real rescue on his hands, all under Iris's watchful gaze. The stakes couldn't be higher!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: A Sick Trick. The racoons watch Mike enviously as he makes himself comfortable in his living room. If only they could get a piece of that sweet action. Then Freddy has an idea. He crashes into the bay window and pretends to be injured, forcing the Mikkelsens to take him in. Mike sees through the ruse immediately, but if he's going to unmask the scheming raccoon he's going to have to defeat the imposter without getting himself in trouble for fighting the poor "injured" Freddy.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Jurassic Bean. Mr Bean is on a photography jaunt in the countryside snapping the normal everyday wildlife – a fox a bird a dinosaur! A DINOSAUR?!! Mr Bean is terrified until he realises what fame and fortune it could bring him. Does he get the photograph of a lifetime or is the situation not quite as it seems?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Caring Bean. Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Opera Bean. Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Taxi Bean. Mr Bean takes a taxi to his local toyshop but a dodgy cabbie thinks he can take Mr Bean for a ride. After a mix up Mr Bean finds himself driving the taxi and starts to have fun couriering people to their destinations even giving an American tourist an extensive tour of London. But will the taxi driver find out what’s been going on and how much will Bean’s final fare be?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Muscle Bean. Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: A New Friend. Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: The Lift. Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Dig This. Mr Bean attempts to build a shady gazebo in the back garden on a scorching hot day. But as he digs into the ground he unearths a huge unexploded bomb. Trying to make Mrs Wicket aware of the danger and save Scrapper and Teddy from being blown to smithereens takes courage nerve and a Bean styled homemade bomb disposal kit.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Hypnotised. Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Car Wash. Mr Bean's car is filthy so he gives it a good wash. His sparklingly clean car attracts the attention of other drivers who offer to pay Mr Bean to wash their cars too. Bean cannot resist and builds a car-washing contraption to help him out. But when a certain very posh visitor’s car gets damaged Bean thinks he’s for the chop.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Where Did You Get That Cat? Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wicket’s flat but her sideboard tumbles over and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realizing that it’s only his landlady’s furry hat Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vets in a desperate attempt to save his feline friend’s life.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Valuable Lessons. Mr Bean helps Mrs Wicket collect up all her money together after she witnesses a robbery. With all her cash safely locked in a bank vault Mrs Wicket suddenly finds she has a new admirer but Mr Bean doesn’t trust this smooth operator one bit. With wedding bells ringing Mr Bean races against time to solve the mystery and save Mrs Wicket…and her money.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Halloween. Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Painting. Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Wrestle Bean. Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Rare Bird. Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.sub-title: Bean's Safari. Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.
programme.desc: Join the strange but hilariously funny Mr Bean and his stuffed teddy on adventures such as avoiding an irate landlady or an evil one-eyed cat.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Carly and Cranky's Big Lift Off
programme.desc: Carly and Cranky's Big Lift Off

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Big TV. Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Keyboard Capers. Determined to master Beethoven’s symphony, Mr Bean wangles himself a grand piano, a music book, a candelabra and a very patient piano teacher. Liberace, eat your heart out!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A Running Battle. It's the start of a Fun Run. Mr. Bean lines-up beside his deadly enemy: the fat bloke who stole his parking space. Fun Run or no, nothing will stop Bean beating this man to the finishing post, even if he has to flag a cab.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Egg & Bean. Mr. Bean gets in a flap when a monster turns up in his cake-mix. The good news, though, is that the monster turns out to be a harmless baby bird. The bad news is that it grows into a huge stork and takes over his home. Bean attempts to return it to the wild, and finds teaching it to fly makes his arms ache.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Nature. The bugs talk about nature.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: What if Tom and Jerry were born in Asia? Follow the new adventures of Tom and Jerry as they feast, play and create mayhem Asia! From food, culture, history and places of interests, get ready for double trouble!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes

programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Cat Match Fever. Butch is bobbing for apple cores when he spots a dolled up Toodles heading his way! Butch slicks back his hair with some lard and strikes a pose. But she walks right past the alley cat. Meanwhile, inside the house, Tom spots Toodles headed in his direction. After a quick spruce up, Tom opens the door only to watch her walk right past the house. Tom slumps. Turns out Toodles is headed to Winston's house. Yep, who knew the two were a match made in kitty heaven (or at least that's what the catmatch app said). Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Fish Out of Water. Hildie and Beatie return from the Ol' Time Goblin Fair with kettle corn, a giant stuffed warlock, and a piranha they won in the ball toss. Despite their warning not to touch the fish, Tom can't pass up a chance to eat the catch of the day! But first he has to get past Jerry who is determined to protect his new friend. When a failed attempt by Tom ends up with the fish bowl being shattered, Jerry quickly casts a spell with the wand that allows the fish to breathe on dry land! The liberated fish is excited to explore his newfound freedom (walking on his tail fin) and ends up making life a lot more complicated for Jerry who's trying to protect him!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Someone's in the Kitchen with Mynah. Ginger brings home a new pet—a mynah bird who can mimic anyone and anything. Rick complains about the money they will have to spend to feed and care for another pet. Spike and Tom are on notice, as somebody's got to go.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: When You Leash Expect It. Ginger decides she wants to teach Tom to walk on a leash to ensure he gets much-needed exercise. Tom hates the leash and does not want to go for a walk. Finally, they're on their way, much to Tom's chagrin. Back home, Jerry and Tuffy proceed to raid the fridge.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Don't Cut the Cheese. It's that special time of year when the Lady of the House's rare, exotic (and very stinky) cheese gets delivered to the manor. It's up to Tom to make sure not a crumb of this cheese—known to be a favorite of mice—goes missing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Calamari Jerry. Ginger leaves some frozen fish on the kitchen counter to thaw. Ginger and Rick warn Tom to keep his paws away, or he will not get anything to eat. Soon, a live baby octopus crawls out of the mouth of one of the thawing fish and jumps off the counter, looking for a place to hide. Jerry befriends him and does his best to protect him from Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Cattyshack. It's time for the annual croquet tournament at the Manor. The butler tells Tom how important it is to the Lady of the Manor to always win…no matter what! The last thing they need is any pesky rodents interfering with the game. Knowing any sighting of Jerry or Tuffy would cast Tom in a bad light, he's determined to keep them off the lawn.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.sub-title: Hair Cut-Ups. Lola is afraid of getting her first haircut.
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.sub-title: A Clean Sweep
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Siblings. The bugs talk about having fun with their siblings.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Lord Bean. Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Car Wars. Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. It’s a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Wedding Day. Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Phone. Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Disappointment. The bugs talk about times they felt disappointed.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike Flu. Poor Mike is bedridden. He's been struck down by a nasty cold so Iris and the turtles are forced take care of his every need, including trying to repel the raccoons from the house. Fighting raccoons isn't their specialty and Iris and the turtles quickly end up locked in the garage. Mike is forced to intervene but he's so sick and weak that he's a pushover. How can he overcome the raccoons this time? Mike's problem could be the very solution he needs to defeat the tenacious raccoons.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: In The Doghouse. Mike is forced to spend the day outside in his doghouse due to Grandma Mikkelsen's fur allergy. Mike makes the best of being exiled and plans to spruce the place up and invite Iris over for an outdoor picnic. But Mercury has been kicked out of his lair after a fight with his brother and decides to squat in the doghouse. Mike does everything he can to wake up the snoozing raccoon and get him out of his home. It looks like he's going to have to bring in the big guns if has any chance of evicting his unwanted guest before Iris shows up.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders.
